attributes.action: Ensure landlords are making appropriate use of Govt grants during COVID19
attributes.additional_details: Tenants (corporate and private) have been financially starved during the Covid crisis, yet their landlords have been supported via Govt grants and not passed any finances on

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for landlords, or for the courts if fraud has taken place.
